about_the_game:
New Citizen is a multiplayer game centered around a community, which builds upon the concept of creating standalone role-playing games that various modding communities have been practicing for years on other games. This game aims to be the first dedicated life simulation game that enables these communities to come together under one title, where they can construct their ideal communities or join existing ones. At the start of the game, players will receive a predetermined amount of money and a lifetime of opportunities.

- AI Police Missions: Respond to various scenarios such as vandalism, active shooters, armed robberies, suspicious packages, and discovered bodies.

- Advanced AI Traffic Stops: Conduct traffic stops with AI vehicles, issue warnings, request IDs, and perform Breathalyzer or drug tests on drivers.
- Realistic Day and Night Cycle

- Experience a variety of everyday jobs, from being a semi-truck driver, loading and unloading packages across town, to working as a garbage truck driver, keeping the streets clean. You can also explore the mines, earn a steady income, and level up your skills to mine more valuable ores.

- Enjoy a deeply captivating, never-ending gameplay loop designed by Specpixel Entertainment to keep you hooked and wanting more.
- Play as a police officer, paramedic, banker, unemployed individual, garbage truck driver, semi truck driver, miner and more...
- Explore the sandbox mode or play with up to 32 players on a multiplayer server.
- Experience a world bustling with both players and AI, featuring pedestrians and traffic that bring the environment to life, delivering a truly immersive experience.
- Utilize advanced social mechanics such as P2P interaction, VoIP chat, and text chat.
- Take advantage of the physical/virtual inventory system.
- Experience an advanced economic system.

You can choose to join the sheriff's department, enforcing laws upon players, responding to callouts, and living a fast-paced, action-packed lifestyle. Alternatively, you can opt for the EMS "Emergency Medical Department" and help those in need, reviving downed players. There is also the civilian role. In the city of Bornwood, you have the chance to live out your dream of being a working-class citizen.

short_description: New Citizen is a modern-themed roleplay adventure game set in a vast open world. The game focuses mainly on the player, creating an environment that feels alive and that is constantly moving.
